meanings.definition: Feel or express strong disapproval of
meanings.sent1: She was deploring the littering in the park.
meanings.sent2: The community deploring the noisy construction work.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't help deploring the way his dog stole his sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's deploring gaze silenced the chatty students.
meanings.sent5: The deploring look on her face made it clear she was not happy with the situation.
